statements: SELECT customer_name, preferred_location FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preferred_style = 'Modern';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_history FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preferred_location = 'New York';
SELECT preferred_location, preferred_style FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, preferred_location, preferred_style FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preferred_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT customer_name, preferred_style FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preferred_location='New York'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_history FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preferred_style='Modern' ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id=1001 OR customer_id=1003
SELECT customer_name, preferred_location FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id=1002 OR customer_id=1004
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_history FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preferred_style='Traditional' LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT phone_number, luxury_home_preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, luxury_home_preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE luxury_home_preference = 'modern';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE luxury_home_preference = 'Modern';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customer_preferences WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, purchase_date, amount FROM purchase_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE preference_name = 'subscription';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'f41d2b40-69dc-4ed3-a9a6-7be488f50db6';
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.name, p.preference_name, p.preference_value FROM customers c INNER JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT preference_description FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT strategy_name, target_purchase_amount FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_preference_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT purchase_date, amount, product_name FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_description FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT strategy_name, target_purchase_amount FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_preference_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, product_name FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 'fd427817-97c5-4a8c-a9c2-3dbfb3cf4f68';
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences ORDER BY preference_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_age_min < 30 AND target_age_max > 40;
SELECT c.name, s.strategy_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_strategies cs ON c.id = cs.customer_id JOIN marketing_strategies s ON cs.strategy_id = s.strategy_id;
